member.name: M:Calendar.EventManagerWithList.AddEvent(Calendar.CalendarEvent)
member.summary: Add event to calendar by title and date
member.remarks: Can be added events with duplicating title or date (or location)

member.name: M:Calendar.EventManagerWithList.DeleteEventsByTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Find and delete from the calendar all events with given title
member.returns: Number of deleted from the calendar events

member.name: M:Calendar.EventManagerWithList.ListEvents(System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: List events from the calendar after given date
member.param: Date, after which start the search for events in the calendar
Number of events, we want to list from the calendar
member.remarks: If there are available more than asked number of events in the calender, will be printed as we asked. Otherwise if there are not enough event in the calendar, will be printed all found events. Events are ordered by date, title and location
